I ensure all crew are properly trained by planning and running weekly drills. It's a demanding position, sometimes satisfying, sometimes frustrating, always challenging.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I believe micro-lending can be an incredible tool for lifting people out of poverty.  Micro-lending is not new.  It's been happening for decades and the concept is proven.  It really works.
lenders.occupational_info:
Marketing Professional with two decades of experience in strategic direct marketing.

I view marketing as more science than art. I'm far more interested in direct response marketing than in branding. I employ a methodical, disciplined approach that is always driven by the bottom line.

It starts with an idea - driven by strategic company needs. I believe in testing ideas at the smallest feasible scale, followed by careful measurement. Test, measure, refine, scale, repeat.

Over the last 5 years, I've gravitated to web marketing. Search marketing has become, by far, the most cost-effective advertising channel in the history of the planet. From a marketer's perspective it's the holy grail because your market self-identifies. It's a dream come true when your market tells you (by the keywords they search for) that they are looking for what you are selling.

For more on my marketing philosophy and experience, visit http://www.jaycasper.net.

Some websites I have worked on:

 
http://www.jaycasper.net
http://www.heritage-education.com
http://www.uscareerinstitute.com
http://www.mckinleycollege.com
http://www.slopetracker.com
http://www.golftrackergps.com
http://www.denverpsychologist.com
http://www.fineprintimaging.com

lenders.loan_because: a loan enabled my education, now I can loan
lenders.occupational_info: anesthesia

lenders.name: Rosie
lenders.loan_because: Everyday acts of mindful solidarity can make a difference to us all.
lenders.occupational_info: As IT director for an international development organization I dedicate my energy, strategic thinking and problem-solving skills towards enabling my colleagues to better engage with the communities we support around the world in ways great and small.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: it is my responsibility to help others less fortunate than me. We - those in the west - often live in this truman show like existence, obilivious to the hardships that some people face. I never truly understood this till I saw it first hand. It is the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info:
Digital Explorer.Online Marketing Geek. Citizen Journalist. Social Justice Advocate. Political Enthusiast. RSS Junkie. Amateur Blogger. Spiritiual Seeker. Zen Backpacker. 

In search of people, passion and purpose.......

lenders.name: Familia Extendida
lenders.loan_because: as a family we have been blessed with love, ability and relative abundance. Our Kiva account started as a birthday wish, and has continued after the deaths of Armandina and Leonard, both whom set a wonderful example for charity and service. We want to contribute to a better world. With the recent death of our family dog, PingaLu, we have added loans that focus on the value of animals.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help enable people to improve their lives. 

I think this is a great concept because it gives hard-working people access to loans that are (hopefully) more easily repaid. Plus -- once the loans are repaid the money can be re-used to help even more people.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate and I want other women to have a chance to make their lives better.

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and the right to have a good life. Sharing makes the world a better place to live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I do accounting for a small business.  But over the years I've been a musician, a waitress, cleaned houses and a volunteer for various organizations.

lenders.name: Charles Pritchard
lenders.loan_because: its helps others out

lenders.name: Helena
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities to people who need them :)
lenders.occupational_info: I write instructions for software users.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: This is a very worthy venture.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with children with special needs.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have enough to share with those who have less, and I like the idea of funding people's dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to resolve disputes between my company and it's clients, and to make sure that the clients are treated fairly.

lenders.name: Tania and Shane
lenders.loan_because: it is helping others in the world that aren't as blessed as us!

lenders.name: Mariana
lenders.loan_because: It just makes sense.

lenders.name: bastakia
lenders.loan_because: I would love to help and participate in a small way.

lenders.name: Ariella
lenders.loan_because: I think about the feeling the recipients get upon receiving news of their loans. It must be amazing.
lenders.occupational_info: I read a lot.

lenders.name: Alec
lenders.loan_because: I like the thought of helping people make better lives for themselves by starting or expanding a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I have run my own business for 15 years and have bought and sold several others.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: My parents have showed me how good it feels to help other, and I think this is a great way to help people.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I dream about being an entrepreneur myself... I am so happy to be able to help make that dream a reality for someone else... and in due time my dream will come true as well.
lenders.occupational_info: It's hard. Many people do not appreciate the blessings we have here in America and take advantage of what is available to them.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people around the world and liked the idea of this wesite.

lenders.name: Shoe
lenders.loan_because: It's good to know who gets the loan and what's happening to the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I write internet applications.

lenders.name: Murray

lenders.name: Kim and Kayla
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help save the United States money by detecting waste and abuse.

lenders.name: Bertin & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I love the people of East Africa!

lenders.name: Perla
lenders.loan_because: we are all one

lenders.name: Rach/Cath-ShiningShakti
lenders.loan_because: in my world, there's more than enough for everyone -- always.  We all deserve abundance and joy while we're here -- as a small business owner I happily receive support while simultaneously supporting others.  The Universe is conspiring to shower us with blessings!
lenders.occupational_info: Shining Shakti is a line of organic cotton, hand-dyed yoga clothing.

lenders.name: rohan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life

lenders.name: 1033 Main Salon & Spa
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that to lift one is to lift all.  Also, to help others pursuing their dreams encourages me in my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make people look and feel their best!

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a good thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop learning solutions

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to build the life they want and if they need help to get started I want to provide the help!

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because:
I care about helping others

Me importa ayudar
lenders.occupational_info: I organize special events in Nicaragua

lenders.name: Carmen & David
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the power of creating and seeing opportunities that others have not opened their eyes to see.
lenders.occupational_info: We are in the business of empowering humankind.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: The concept of helping people to help themselves is simply a brilliant idea!

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I love to help and I love to give. Giving has never been so much fun.

lenders.name: Kerri
lenders.loan_because: As an business owner, I know how hard it can be to make things work..even in the land of opportunity. I want to encourage others and help them to be able to support their families as much as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer. I take photographs of weddings and special events as well as portraits of kids and families. My dream is to one day have my own photography studio where my husband can work with me.

lenders.name: Dorna & Keith
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand, once in a while.

lenders.name: Rie
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people reach for their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: My lab I work for is trying to develop vaccines for infectious diseases such as Tularemia, Malaria, and Melioidosis.

lenders.name: The Gagliardi Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who may be less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students but we ran a lemonade stand in our neighborhood.  We talked with our Mom and Dad about using the money we made to help others in need.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: God has been so good to me, and I feel that he wants me to help others as he has helped me, so that I can show God's love to others through my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families to get mortgage loans to purchase new homes or to refinance their existing mortgage loans.

lenders.name: lsilds
lenders.occupation: wife, mother, g-mother, daughter, sister, friend
lenders.loan_because: "when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God."  B of M, Mosiah 2:17

lenders.name: Aidan
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 2nd grade student.

lenders.name: Nick & Kerrie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun, dude. And hopefully it helps make the world a better place. Maybe someday we'll need a little boost from a friendly lending institution, who knows.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator in a small, project-based learning charter school located in Henderson, Mn. My wife, Kerrie, is an administrative assistant for a telecom firm in Mn. T

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to have the opportunity to improve their lives.  I benefited from help when I needed it, and I'm passing it along to others in need.

lenders.name: Boris
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: EE student

lenders.name: Trudy
lenders.loan_because: I think microlending is facinating and love the fact that I can contribute directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an AMAZING organization that provides assistant throughout the world, including the area of microlending.

lenders.name: LendingHands2U
lenders.loan_because: It's such a TINY sacrifice for me to do so much good. In the US, we spend too much on luxuries that we consider necessities. People in other countries have to be far more resourceful and work so much harder for far less. Anything I can do to enable people to gain the factors they need to help themselves, I am glad to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a computer to make websites that help companies to do their work.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: we need to build a global community where everyone is connected and supported.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach graduate students to work in schools, and help children.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: it mixes financial and social responsibility in one.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep track of the money that comes in and out of a business as an accountant. Or I check a business to see if their financial numbers are accurate as an auditor.

lenders.name: Anne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Bruce Wagner
lenders.loan_because: I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I host a television talk show taped in New York City.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Alma
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and business consultant who appreciates the ability to assist other motivated individuals achieve success through hard work and dedication.  I love to see the power of the internet and social networking advance society in fundamental benevolent movements such as KIVA. Stand up, Reach out, because...Everyone matters!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies to understand the competitive advantage of a healthy workplace.  I use the Denison Culture Survey to provide a current benchmark and road map for future success.

lenders.name: Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: I have an entrepreneurial spirit and I want to help others succeed especially those with the odds stacked against them.  All of us have a purpose in life and leaving a legacy that you can be proud of is a mission that consumes my spirit.  I do not need pats on the back for reaching out and helping someone but I do want to encourage others to give back whether it is in your own community or in the world's community.  I am delighted to be able to support the wonderful work of Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that builds homes for low income families who have a need for housing.  Families must live in overcrowded conditions, live in substandard or inadequate housing or pay 50% of their income for rent.  We serve people in the 30-50% of the median income range and they are those who might not ever know the joy of homeownership.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.occupational_info: I teach courses in Mathematics and Business.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Micro financing makes a real difference.

lenders.name: Cornelia
lenders.loan_because: Just because.
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: Ibrahim
lenders.loan_because: I like to help to make people's lives more easy and secure.
lenders.occupational_info: Describing my work to the world: Slowly, slowly, slowly and yes sometimes there is some stress but surely much joy too. Inshallah in the right direction.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: we all need some help now and then!

lenders.name: Adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed with a wonderful family, great job, and all the comforts of life. I want to share some of my good fortune with those in need and who are willing to work to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Mary Ann in Cambodia
lenders.loan_because: The generosity of others helped me reach this point in my life where I can be generous with others.
lenders.occupational_info: For nearly 40 years, I worked in corporate American.  I now volunteer most of my time helping others.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Daniel has a 2-year-old food shop in Africa on Abacha Road Port Harcourt nigeria, where he sells food to his customers, who are mostly foreigners and the community people. he is 27 years old with 2 children, as he caters to grandchildren and cousins as well. he needs a loan to enable him to buy more goods, although he makes some of them himself, as well as help to look after his home. he is a member of Committed men in Development, a lending group that has helped in instilling the discipline of saving and teamwork among its members.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Knowing that a small effort on my part makes a big difference to someone else is very rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a teacher.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: I know what it feels like when you have good intentions and just need a little help to get your business started.  By helping others, you can motivate them to help more people.  "Pay it Forward," it feels good to help responsible people and their community become more productive.
lenders.occupational_info: I am building a job centric social networking web service  with a team of people that are passionate about helping others.

lenders.name: HEIDI
lenders.loan_because: Looking to help someone out where I can!

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer years and years ago and saw how much a little bit of money could change the lives of hardworking people.
lenders.occupational_info: Middle school Science teacher

lenders.name: Rohun
lenders.loan_because: I think micro financing is a great way to empower people and help eliminate poverty.  And I want to help in anyway possible

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometimes...

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to some poor countries and a small amount of money can make a big difference for the people of these countries.  It is amazing what they can do with so litlte.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in the community on a daily basis.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because:
I could buy more meaningless stuff but I don't need it and these people do.  

I am a PROUD PROGRESSIVE LIBERAL.
lenders.occupational_info:
I pick the photos that are printed in a sports magazine.

And I love it.

lenders.name: CMA
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others to become successful in their lives

lenders.name: maxie
lenders.loan_because: there but for the grace of god goes I
lenders.occupational_info: In recent readings i stumbled across this quote that sums it up pretty good "...at times we may pretend we dont hear our calling to serve, or we may rationalize that we are too busy.  we may even try to convince ourselves that we are not capable because someone else is more qualified.  however, god does not call the qualified; god qualifies those called."

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me feel good. :-)

and I like to think that if our positions were reversed, the people that I loan to would loan to me.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of investing in the future not only with my limited funding but with an infusion of hope and inclusion.
lenders.occupational_info: I weigh refuse that is going into a public landfill...the customer who brings in the garbage is charged a tonnage rate/fee for what is disposed of.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I'm a former Peace Corps Volunteer who served in Burkina Faso in West Africa. I've seen firsthand what life is like in developing countries. I want to help give others opportunity the way I've been given it by accident of birth.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the national service field.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I can! Just trying to do my part.
lenders.occupational_info: As a genetic counselor I see patients who have, or are at risk to develop, genetic diseases. I also work for a new company that is bringing genetic testing to the consumer market.

lenders.name: Sergey, Teresa & Paola
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people realize their potential

lenders.name: SIMON
lenders.loan_because: Am glad a little help from me can help those in need. And wishing everyone good health and happiness forever.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have enough and lots of support.  I would like to help others to have the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students figure out how to pay for college.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because:
There are many  people with entrepreneurial spirit who can make a difference.
Giving money anonymously to organizations is boring.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupational_info: I provide home care to people so they can heal  and age in their own home and not in a facility.

lenders.name: Katya
lenders.loan_because:
-I want to give people a chance, as I have been given chances by others
-Its nice to help those, who want to help themselves
-I want to make a difference, and think that this is such a good idea
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small business owner and design and manufacture clothing and have a retail store to promote emerging designers

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: It's a way I can help to reduce the inequalities in our world.
lenders.occupational_info: As an awareness practitioner I help people get in touch with the wisdom and guidance within themselves. As a facilitator I try to make space to hold and address the tensions that are present between between and between different groups of people.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: We can do big things together. And we have so much to give, it just takes a little effort and a little heart.

lenders.name: Inge
lenders.loan_because:
We live in a rich country and have finally a good personal economy.
I believe in the Law of the Universe, that what you give will come back to you some day, in some form. In my work I see that this is true.
We adopted a boy from Colombia many years ago, and he now has children of his own. We feel that it's time to give something back ourselves.
Our primary target will be South America because we feel something special for that part of the world and for its warm, generous and hospitable people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help and support people to make a good living, and with health prevention.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because:
I like to help those who are willing to help themselves.
Many small contributions from around the world can make a big difference in ones life and the community around them.

lenders.name: terry
lenders.loan_because: someone very special helped me to finish my education by paying for it.  I loan in her honor, and her mother's honor, becuase she helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize my boss's life for him.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I have my students pick the people that need loans.  Then we see what happens.  For Christmas this year I gave my my niece and nephew $100 dollars each to donate.  Pass on the urge to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 180 8th graders life science. Most students are 13-14 years old.  I love to teach.
